actions.message:
**CCG:**
The Commission of Counter, usually abbreviated as CCG, was a federal agency in the Tokyo Ghoul series that serves as a criminal investigative body in cases connected to ghouls. The Ghoul Countermeasures Law was the legal foundation for the CCG's prosecution of ghouls. 

**Quinque:**
A quinque is the weapon used by CCG Investigators made from ghoul kakuhou sacs and quinque steel. There are also canon quinque‚Äôs in this server which means quinques form the anime/manga but you usually make your own quinque, a custom one.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
**Ghouls**:
Ghouls are basically another species other than human that can only eat human meat and cannot stand the taste of human food. There are natural one eyed ghouls that can eat human food but they can only be born if it‚Äôs a kid of a human and a ghoul. Then there are Artificial one eyed ghouls which come from a surgery done on humans and they are like normal ghouls but just stronger. 

**Kagune**:
 A Kagune is basically a ghouls weapon which they can form from their body. There are 4 types of kagunes, Rinkaku, Bikaku, Ukaku, Koukaku. A Rinkaku is basically tentacles, Bikaku is a tail, Ukaku are wings/Ranged kagunes and a Koukaku is a blade or tendril sticking out from the shoulder.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
This is the Tokyo Ghoul Lucid Massacre‚Äôs own bot. It has all the information on the server, roleplaying and Tokyo ghoul in general.

***Here are all the commands for this bot:***
**$help:** Shows this message!
**$ghoulhelp:** Shows basic information on ghouls.
**$ccghelp:** Shows basic information on CCG.
**$roleplayhelp:** Shows information on how to roleplay.
**$starthelp:** This shows you everything on how to get started on roleplaying.
**$ghoulleaderboard:** Shows you the leaderboard for top 5 strongest ghouls in the server.
**$ccgleaderboard:** Shows you the leaderboard for the top 5 strongest CCG members in the server.
**$npcspawners:** Shows the list of people that can spawn NPC's for you
**$trainers:** Shows the list of people who can train you
**$ghoulroll:** Used for the Artificial One Eyed Ghoul surgery
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
Here in this server you can get your OC trained by a trainer. Now, a trainer is a staff character's OC and they will have a quick fight with you and you will gain XP according to the person you fought.

actions.message:
The NPC system is basically you fighting an OC that isn't anyone's. The NPC's are made and you just need to go and claim one of them and then wait for a staff member to come and NPC for you.

**Here are the NPC Spawners currently:**

actions.message: The first thing to do is to go to the channel ‚ÄúSelf Roles‚Äù and give yourself roles, then you need to go and make a character (Ask staff if you don‚Äôt know how to) it can be a CCG or Ghoul, you can make multiple characters but the limit is 10 characters. When you have made your character go on to making their kagune if their a ghoul and quinque is their a CCG. After they get approved you have to read all the help sections, and if you still don‚Äôt understand something ask in the channel ‚ÄúQuestions and help‚Äù. After you understand everything you‚Äôre free to roleplay.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: Tokyo Ghoul Roleplaying has a lot of elements that normal roleplaying doesn‚Äôt because of the ghouls and how they work. Lets get the basics out, when roleplaying if you want to say something out of roleplay put ‚Äú)‚Äù at the end of the sentence. When you‚Äôre stating something the character did add ‚Äú*‚Äù behind and in front of the line. When the character is saying something add quotation marks (‚Äú). There are different forms of roleplaying, for example, CRP (Combat Roleplay), PRP (Peaceful roleplay) and ERP (Erotic Roleplay). In Combat roleplays you can fight and you decide on if killing is allowed or not, in Peaceful Roleplays you don‚Äôt fight but just chat and hang out and in Erotic Roleplays you can make your oc‚Äôs have fun and have intercourse BUT raping is not allowed because it‚Äôs a serious matter. If you rape someone‚Äôs character it will result in a ban immediately. For combat roleplay‚Äôs it doesn‚Äôt matter how strong the character is, if a weak person is better at roleplaying than a strong person than the weak person can win so choose wisely who you decide to have a fight with. Also, in Tokyo Ghoul roleplay‚Äôs ghoul‚Äôs and CCG investigators cannot peaceful roleplay nor erotic roleplay because they must fight only.
actions.name: Set Embed Description
